availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Lawler (Owen County, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married Lucy J. Byrnes Lawler in Owen County, Kentucky, on June 1, 1852. Hotel keeper in Owen County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 222.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 182A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272768, p. 40.
Find A Grave, "John H. Lawler (Aug 24,1823-July 28 1884)," Memorial #109766165, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/09766165 (accessed June 12, 2020).
